name: ItsSmartToolBot
description: A Smart Telegram Bot With Multi Functional Tools.

API_ID.description: Get from my.telegram.org. Required for Pyro Bot Client.

API_HASH.description: Get from my.telegram.org. Required for Pyro Bot Client.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get from @BotFather. Required for Pyro Bot Client.

SESSION_STRING.description: Generate from @ItsSmartToolBot. Required for secure session.

ADMIN_IDS.description: Comma-separated Telegram User IDs. Get from @ItsSmartToolBot using /info.

OWNER_IDS.description: Comma-separated Telegram User IDs. Get from @ItsSmartToolBot using /info.

DEVELOPER_USER_ID.description: Telegram User ID of the bot developer. Get from @ItsSmartToolBot using /info.

MONGO_URL.description: MongoDB URL for bot users database and broadcast.

DATABASE_URL.description: Database URL for group settings database.

DB_URL.description: Database URL for group channel binding database.

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Spotify Client ID from Spotify Developer Dashboard. Required for Spotify features.

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Spotify Client Secret from Spotify Developer Dashboard. Required for Spotify features.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API Key from OpenAI API Developer Console. Required for AI features.

GROQ_API_KEY.description: GROQ API Key from GROQ API Console.

TEXT_MODEL.description: Text model for GROQ API. Defaults to deepseek-r1-distill-llama-70b.

LOCATIONIQ_API_KEY.description: LocationIQ API Key from LocationIQ website.

IPINFO_API_TOKEN.description: IPInfo API Token from IPInfo website.

NEWS_API_KEY.description: News API Key from the specified news website.

BIN_KEY.description: BIN Key from HandyAPI.com. Free 6000 credits on signup.

DOMAIN_API_KEY.description: Domain API Key from WhoisXMLAPI website console.

DOMAIN_API_URL.description: Domain API URL from WhoisXMLAPI. Defaults to https://www.whoisxmlapi.com/whoisserver/WhoisService.

COMMAND_PREFIX.description: Command prefixes separated by |. Defaults to !|.|#|,|/.

CC_SCRAPPER_LIMIT.description: Limit for CC scrapper. Defaults to 5000. Higher may risk account ban.

SUDO_CCSCR_LIMIT.description: Sudo CC scrapper limit. Defaults to 10000. Higher may risk account ban.

MULTI_CCSCR_LIMIT.description: Multi CC scrapper limit. Defaults to 2000.

SUDO_MAILSCR_LIMIT.description: Sudo mail scrapper limit. Defaults to 15000.

CC_GEN_LIMIT.description: Credit card generation limit. Defaults to 2000.

MULTI_CCGEN_LIMIT.description: Multi credit card generation limit. Defaults to 5000.

UPDATE_CHANNEL_URL.description: Bot updates channel URL. Defaults to t.me/TheSmartDev.

PROFILE_ERROR_URL.description: URL for user profile photo error fallback. Defaults to https://t.me/Bot_Bug_test/9305.

DOMAIN_CHK_LIMIT.description: Max number of domains to check with WhoisAPI. Defaults to 20.

PROXY_CHECK_LIMIT.description: Max number of proxies to check. Defaults to 20.

OCR_WORKER_URL.description: OCR Worker URL for Gemini OCR tools.

TEXT_API_URL.description: Text API URL for custom Google API models.

IMAGE_API_URL.description: Image API URL for custom Google API models.

IMGAI_SIZE_LIMIT.description: Max file size for image AI tools. Defaults to 5242880 (5MB).

MAX_TXT_SIZE.description: Max text file size. Defaults to 15728640 (15MB).

MAX_VIDEO_SIZE.description: Max video file size. Defaults to 2147483648 (2GB).

YT_COOKIES_PATH.description: Path to YouTube Netscape cookies file. Defaults to ./cookies/ItsSmartToolBot.txt.

VIDEO_RESOLUTION.description: Video resolution for YouTube downloads. Defaults to 1280x720.
